abstract: Pete Wells reviews Oiji restaurant in East Village.
lead_paragraph: Oiji in the East Village updates and translates Korean cuisine, adjusting traditional recipes for the small-plates era, while aiming for a little French-style nuance.

headline.main: Restaurant Review: Oiji in the East Village
headline.print_headline: Stalking the Korean Honey-Butter Chip Craze

snippet: Oiji in the East Village updates and translates Korean cuisine, adjusting traditional recipes for the small-plates era, while aiming for a little French-style nuance.
